source:
%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW sap_hr_historic_old_data 
AS
SELECT DISTINCT

null as MeasureID,
pers_no AS  EmployeeID  ,
first_name  AS  FirstName   ,
last_name   AS  LastName    ,
employee_no AS  EmployeeNo  ,
cocd    AS  CoCd    ,
company_code    AS  CompanyCode ,
pa  AS  PA  ,
personnel_area  AS  PersonnelArea   ,
psubarea    AS  PSubArea    ,
personnel_subarea   AS  PersonnelSubArea    ,
org_unit    AS  OrgUnit ,
organizational_unit AS  OrganizationalUnit  ,
organizational_key  AS  OrganizationalKey1  ,
organizational_key1 AS  OrganizationalKey2  ,
workc   AS  WorkC   ,
work_contract   AS  WorkContract    ,
ct  AS  CT  ,
contract_type   AS  ContractType    ,
ps_group    AS  PSGroup ,
pay_band_description    AS  PayBandDescription  ,
fte AS  FTE ,
wk_hrs  AS  WeekHours   ,
indicator_part_time_employee    AS  IndicatorPartTimeEmployee   ,
s   AS  S   ,
employment_status   AS  EmploymentStatus    ,
gender_key  AS  GenderKey   ,
tra_start_date  AS  TRAStartDate    ,
tra_end_date    AS  TRAEndDate  ,
tra_status  AS  TRAStatus   ,
tra_grade   AS  TRAGrade    ,
prev_persno AS  PrevPersNo  ,
actr    AS  Actr    ,
reason_for_action   AS  ReasonForAction ,
position    AS  Position    ,
position1   AS  Position1   ,
cost_ctr    AS  CostCtr ,
cost_centre AS  CostCentre  ,
civil_service_start AS  CivilServiceStart   ,
date_to_current_job AS  DateToCurrentJob    ,
seniority_date  AS  SeniorityDate   ,
date_to_subst_grade AS  DateToSubstGrade    ,
pers_no_1   AS  PersNo1 ,
name_of_manager_om  AS  NameOfManagerOm ,
manager_position    AS  ManagerPosition ,
manager_position_text   AS  ManagerPositionText ,
counter_sign_manager    AS  CounterSignManager  ,
loc AS  Loc ,
location    AS  Location    ,
org_start_date  AS  OrgStartDate    ,
fix_term_end_date   AS  FixTermEndDate  ,
loan_start_date AS  LoanStartDate   ,
loan_end_date   AS  LoanEndDate ,
eegrp   AS  EEGrp   ,
employee_group  AS  EmployeeGroup   ,
annual_salary   AS  AnnualSalary    ,
curr    AS  Curr    ,
ni_number   AS  NINumber    ,
birth_date  AS  BirthDate   ,
age_of_employee AS  AgeOfEmployee   ,
eo  AS  EO  ,
ethnic_origin   AS  EthnicOrigin    ,
nid AS  NID ,
rel AS  Rel ,
religious_denomination_key  AS  ReligiousDenominationKey    ,
sxo AS  Sxo ,
wage_type   AS  WageType    ,
employee_subgroup   AS  EmployeeSubgroup    ,
loa_abs_type    AS  LoaAbsType  ,
loa_absence_type_text   AS  LoaAbsenceTypeText  ,
scheme_reference    AS  SchemeReference ,
pension_scheme_name AS  PensionSchemeName   ,
disability_code AS  DisabilityCode  ,
disability_text AS  DisabilityText  ,
disability_code_description AS  DisabilityCodeDescription   ,
parea   AS  PArea   ,
payroll_area    AS  PayrollArea ,
assignment_number   AS  AssignmentNumber    ,
fte_2   AS  FTE2    ,
Report_MonthEnd_Date    AS  ReportMonthEndDate  ,
leave_entitlement_hrs   AS  LeaveEntitlementHours   ,
leave_taken_hrs AS  LeaveTakenHours ,
leave_remaining_hours   AS  LeaveRemainingHours ,
leave_remaining_prorata_hours   AS  LeaveRemainingProrataHours,
1 as SourceSystemID,
CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as IngestionDate,
null as ValidTo,
md5(concat(IFNULL(pers_no,'.'),     IFNULL(first_name,'.'),     IFNULL(last_name,'.'),  IFNULL(employee_no,'.'),    IFNULL(cocd,'.'),   IFNULL(company_code,'.'),   IFNULL(pa,'.'),     IFNULL(personnel_area,'.'),     IFNULL(psubarea,'.'),   IFNULL(personnel_subarea,'.'),  IFNULL(org_unit,'.'),   IFNULL(organizational_unit,'.'),    IFNULL(organizational_key,'.'),     IFNULL(organizational_key1,'.'),    IFNULL(workc,'.'),  IFNULL(work_contract,'.'),  IFNULL(ct,'.'),     IFNULL(contract_type,'.'),  IFNULL(ps_group,'.'),   IFNULL(pay_band_description,'.'),   IFNULL(fte,'.'),    IFNULL(wk_hrs,'.'),     IFNULL(indicator_part_time_employee,'.'),   IFNULL(s,'.'),  IFNULL(employment_status,'.'),  IFNULL(gender_key,'.'),     IFNULL(tra_start_date,'.'),     IFNULL(tra_end_date,'.'),   IFNULL(tra_status,'.'),     IFNULL(tra_grade,'.'),  IFNULL(prev_persno,'.'),    IFNULL(actr,'.'),   IFNULL(reason_for_action,'.'),  IFNULL(position,'.'),   IFNULL(position1,'.'),  IFNULL(cost_ctr,'.'),   IFNULL(cost_centre,'.'),    IFNULL(civil_service_start,'.'),    IFNULL(date_to_current_job,'.'),    IFNULL(seniority_date,'.'),     IFNULL(date_to_subst_grade,'.'),    IFNULL(pers_no_1,'.'),  IFNULL(name_of_manager_om,'.'),     IFNULL(manager_position,'.'),   IFNULL(manager_position_text,'.'),  IFNULL(counter_sign_manager,'.'),   IFNULL(loc,'.'),    IFNULL(location,'.'),   IFNULL(org_start_date,'.'),     IFNULL(fix_term_end_date,'.'),  IFNULL(loan_start_date,'.'),    IFNULL(loan_end_date,'.'),  IFNULL(eegrp,'.'),  IFNULL(employee_group,'.'),     IFNULL(annual_salary,'.'),  IFNULL(curr,'.'),   IFNULL(ni_number,'.'),  IFNULL(birth_date,'.'),     IFNULL(age_of_employee,'.'),    IFNULL(eo,'.'),     IFNULL(ethnic_origin,'.'),  IFNULL(nid,'.'),    IFNULL(rel,'.'),    IFNULL(religious_denomination_key,'.'),     IFNULL(sxo,'.'),    IFNULL(wage_type,'.'),  IFNULL(employee_subgroup,'.'),  IFNULL(loa_abs_type,'.'),   IFNULL(loa_absence_type_text,'.'),  IFNULL(scheme_reference,'.'),   IFNULL(pension_scheme_name,'.'),    IFNULL(disability_code,'.'),    IFNULL(disability_text,'.'),    IFNULL(disability_code_description,'.'),    IFNULL(parea,'.'),  IFNULL(payroll_area,'.'),   IFNULL(assignment_number,'.'),  IFNULL(fte_2,'.'),  IFNULL(report_monthend_date,'.'),   IFNULL(leave_entitlement_hrs,'.'),  IFNULL(leave_taken_hrs,'.'),    IFNULL(leave_remaining_hours,'.'),  IFNULL(leave_remaining_prorata_hours,'.'))) as RowID,
'Y' as IsActive


FROM odw_standardised_db.sap_hr_historic
WHERE CAST(report_monthend_date AS DATE) < '2023-03-31';

# View sap_hr_historic_old_data is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key, insert rows
## Table odw_curated_db.mipins_hr_measures is updated

%%sql

MERGE INTO odw_curated_db.mipins_hr_measures AS Target
USING sap_hr_historic_old_data AS Source

ON Source.MeasureID = Target.MeasureID

WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT * ;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_curated_db.mipins_hr_measures is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new MeasureID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_curated_db.mipins_hr_measures

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY MeasureID NULLS LAST) AS MeasureID, -- surrogate key
    EmployeeID	,
    FirstName	,
    LastName	,
    EmployeeNo	,
    CoCd	,
    CompanyCode	,
    PA	,
    PersonnelArea	,
    PSubArea	,
    PersonnelSubArea	,
    OrgUnit	,
    OrganizationalUnit	,
    OrganizationalKey1	,
    OrganizationalKey2	,
    WorkC	,
    WorkContract	,
    CT	,
    ContractType	,
    PSGroup	,
    PayBandDescription	,
    FTE	,
    WeekHours	,
    IndicatorPartTimeEmployee	,
    S	,
    EmploymentStatus	,
    GenderKey	,
    TRAStartDate	,
    TRAEndDate	,
    TRAStatus	,
    TRAGrade	,
    PrevPersNo	,
    Actr	,
    ReasonForAction	,
    Position	,
    Position1	,
    CostCtr	,
    CostCentre	,
    CivilServiceStart	,
    DateToCurrentJob	,
    SeniorityDate	,
    DateToSubstGrade	,
    PersNo1	,
    NameOfManagerOm	,
    ManagerPosition	,
    ManagerPositionText	,
    CounterSignManager	,
    Loc	,
    Location	,
    OrgStartDate	,
    FixTermEndDate	,
    LoanStartDate	,
    LoanEndDate	,
    EEGrp	,
    EmployeeGroup	,
    AnnualSalary	,
    Curr	,
    NINumber	,
    BirthDate	,
    AgeOfEmployee	,
    EO	,
    EthnicOrigin	,
    NID	,
    Rel	,
    ReligiousDenominationKey	,
    Sxo	,
    WageType	,
    EmployeeSubgroup	,
    LoaAbsType	,
    LoaAbsenceTypeText	,
    SchemeReference	,
    PensionSchemeName	,
    DisabilityCode	,
    DisabilityText	,
    DisabilityCodeDescription	,
    PArea	,
    PayrollArea	,
    AssignmentNumber	,
    FTE2	,
    ReportMonthEndDate	,
    LeaveEntitlementHours	,
    LeaveTakenHours	,
    LeaveRemainingHours	,
    LeaveRemainingProrataHours	,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_curated_db.mipins_hr_measures;
